column8: (1, 3, 2, 1, 2, 4, 3, 5, 2, 1, "Very annoying to find a balance between watching the video in a reasonable amount of time, tracking the objects in your head and following a sequence of what happened. Would be more manageable if watched he video slower, but I don't want to spend the whole 40 minutes.")
column12: (1, 3, 2, 1, 2, 5, 4, 5, 1, 1, 'The question answering is really slow which is frustrating for a time sensitive task. The answers the system gave lacked specifics so it was hard to trust them. Additionally, when requested for more detail the additional detail was wrong or not helpful such as the requested timestamps were wrong and "you climb stairs when the light is red" isn\'t useful.')
column16: (4, 1, 4, 2, 4, 4, 5, 2, 4, 2, "Would be nice if a button on the image could jump to the point in the video to verify the existence or context . It was inconsistent with the naming of objects and showing if something doesn't exist. Would be nice to requery to check if something existed outside of those top 4 images for example if there was 5 doors. ")
column20: (4, 1, 4, 1, 4, 2, 5, 2, 5, 1, 'Seemed like a nice balance between having to watch the video and answering the questions. The summaries were a little clunky and annoying to watch in slowmo. Also its hard to tell if the system could not find an object or the object does not exist in the video.')
column22: ('Video', 'It has the visual element of the image gallery but with the context of the video so I could understand more about what I was looking at in the image', 'Text', 'I had no way to confirm what it was saying it was true I just had to trust the AI completely ', 'Yes', 'Scrubbing through the video even at 8x speed and keeping all of the questions and information in your head is difficult. If the task is to quickly answer specific questions reducing the cognitive load through the AI tools be pre-filtering out the extra dead air is helpful.')
